question: What is the name of the new campaign launched by the NITI Aayog, to help people follow norms to contain the spread of Covid-19?
explanation:
Government think-tank NITI Aayog has launched a behaviour change campaign named 'Navigating the New Normal'.
The campaign aims to help people follow norms to contain the spread of Covid-19 across the country. The campaign has been developed under the guidance of Empowered Group 6, chaired by NITI Aayog CEO Amitabh Kant. It focusses on safe practises to be followed including wearing masks.
